nodes.text: The 276th Imperial TIE Bomber Group was an Imperial starfighter group whose pilots flew TIE/sa bombers.

The 276th Imperial flew TIE/sa bombers that were colored with the standard gray of the Empire. Armed with proton torpedos, they were configured to sacrifice weapons strength for increased maneuverability and target accuracy. This was in contrast to their contemporary squadron, the 323rd Imperial.
